column6: "GOLGOTHA" Part 5 (of 5) The final confrontation with the hideous Golgotha happens here! Can the X-Men get over their inner demons and finally destroy this creature for good?!
column8: | colorist:Liquid Graphics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Peter Milligan | letterer:Cory Petit
